metadata.feature_description: Get default settings for new pages based on parent or system defaults

steps.action: Clicked 'Add Page' button to open Add Page form
steps.expected: Add Page form should open with default settings populated
steps.actual: Add Page form opened with default settings: Page Type=Standard, Parent Page=None Specified, Workflow=Direct Publish, Display in Menu=On, Link Tracking=Off, Enable Scheduling=Off

steps.action: Verified default values in the form
steps.expected: Form should display system defaults for new page
steps.actual: Default values confirmed: Page ID=0, Status=Visible, Versioning=Off, Workflow=Off in header; Direct Publish workflow selected in dropdown

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Get default settings with parent ID

steps.action: Clicked Parent Page dropdown and selected 'Home' as parent page
steps.expected: Parent page should be updated and form should refresh with appropriate defaults
steps.actual: Parent Page changed to 'Home'. Page Parent header updated to show 'Home'. Default settings (Page Type=Standard, Workflow=Direct Publish) remained consistent

steps.action: Verified form header shows new parent page
steps.actual: Header correctly displays 'Page Parent: Home' while maintaining all default settings

steps.action: Opened Workflow dropdown to view default selection
steps.expected: Workflow should show 'Direct Publish' as the default selection
steps.actual: Workflow dropdown shows 'Direct Publish' as selected default. Available workflows displayed: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow

steps.action: Verified Page Type radio button selection in Add Page form
steps.actual: Page Type 'Standard' radio button is selected by default. Other available options: Existing, URL, File

observations: The GetDefaultSettings API endpoint supports an optional pageId parameter for parent-based defaults
Default workflow is determined by TabWorkflowSettings.Instance.GetDefaultTabWorkflowId() which returns 'Direct Publish'
Default permissions inheritance is handled at the API level when saving the page, not visible in the UI during page creation
Template selection defaults to 'Evoq Page Template' mode with 'Cavalier - Main' template pre-selected
